about_the_game:
“It was our fault. Our home, Earth, was attacked and devastated. But we prevailed. We managed to drive out the Lerp and acquire their technology. Our mission now is to find resources and seek a new home for humanity. We know they will attack again. But we will be prepared. We will do what we do best: Survive."

A LONG SURVIVE

A Long Survive is a cooperative shooter game focused on survival against waves of varied enemies. It is an intense action game with resource management, real-time strategy and building elements. One of its keys features is its immersive VR experience, which is compatible with all kinds of VR devices, as well as its crossplay connectivity with PC Players.
All the Project is building in Unreal Engine 5.

JOINS THE SPACE CORP

In A Long Survive, you will take on the role of a soldier from Space Corp. You will have to go with your team to one of the extraction bases on the new planets taken by humans.
But obviously, it won't be easy.
These extraction bases are besieged by the Lerp army. You will have to survive their waves as long as you can while protecting the nexus.
Will you be able to complete the mission? Or Will you have to escape?


GAME HIGHLIGHTS


  • SURVIVE - PROTECT THE NEXUS.
    You have to survive different waves filled with many enemies with different mechanics that Will attack you relentlessly. And what's more important; you must protect the Nexus. If the Nexus falls, the game is over.
  • MANAGE YOUR RESOURCES – FORTIFY YOUR POSITION.
    You will have a wide variety of weapons to survive. But not only that. Thanks to the "Forge Gun" and the resources you acquire during the game, you can fortify your position. You will have the possibility to build walls, turrets, and many other constructions that will help you protect the nexus.
    Be smart. Use your resources and those of your team strategically.
  • INTENSE GAMEPLAY – (Shooter) REAL-TIME STRATEGY.
    The waves of enemies will become increasingly numerous and difficult. They can attack from different locations. You'll have to adapt to each wave without much reaction time.
    There won't be any break. If you want to survive, you'll have to be quick and effective.
  • COOP - CROSSPLAY.
    You are part of a team. Don't forget that. Join online matches with your friends, whether on any VR device or even on PC.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64bit or higher
  • Processor: Intel i5-7500 / Ryzen 5 1600 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / RX 580 equivalent or greater
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR
  • Additional Notes: VR Headset required for VR version
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 6500 / Ryzen 5 2600 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 / RX 5700 equivalent or greater
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR
  • Additional Notes: VR Headset required for VR version

name: A Long Survive

short_description: Will you be able to survive? Long Survive is a cooperative shooter in which you'll have to survive waves of enemies. Protect the nexus by fortifying your area with various structures and prepare for the siege. Upgrade your weapons, strategize with your teammates. Survive!
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
